https://tmrev.io/movie/537709-Cain's Descendant 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xtLI4u4SkOi3E2Cec2PpWALDrcd.jpg Munakata has an unrelenting guilt from killing his mother when he was 15 years old. After being imprisoned for 10 years, he is released and heads to Yako, a small industrial town, to work as a machinist. Living in a tiny apartment, he is tasked with secretly creating a gun out of an old TV remote control and unknowingly destroys the fragile balance of the town. Cain's Descendant
